"Rep. Susan Brooks, (R-IN), who sponsored the legislation, H.R. 6378, told the audience that #PAHPA ensures that the national stockpile of vaccines, medical equipment and diagnostics are prioritized for further development...." >>  https://homelandprepnews.com/countermeasures/31519-house-lawmakers-alliance-for-biosecurity-urge-senate-to-pass-pandemic-all-hazards-reauthorization-bill/ … pic.twitter.com/2UpYYKliLc

Reforms to the Congressional Accountability Act of 1994 are sorely needed to protect the integrity of and public confidence in Congress, to ensure that the legislative branch remains a place where men and women want to serve, and to improve accountability on these vital issues.

Members and employees alike should be able to work free from sexual harassment or discrimination of any kind. The American public must also have confidence that we in Congress not only view these issues with the seriousness they demand – but that we are taking action.

Proud to join the entire Ethics Cmte to send this letter to House & Senate leaders urging passage of legislation to reform the Congressional Accountability Act (CAA), which would strengthen workplace rights & protections for employees in the leg. branch & hold Members accountable pic.twitter.com/wcZ6TeZR6w
